movieName: Lord of the Rings The Fellowship of the Ring
description:
In a small, cozy village in Middle-earth, a ring with 
special powers happens to be in the hands of the hobbit Frodo. 
It is an instrument that would enable Sauron, 
the dark ruler of the kingdom of Mordor, to take over the world.

movieName: Lord of the Rings The Two Towers
description:
The various members of the society try to help Frodo in their own way. 
The mysterious creature Gollum leads Frodo and Sam to Mordor.

movieName: Lord of the Rings The Return of the King
description:
The society prepares for the final battle against Sauron. 
While Frodo tries to destroy the ring, 
Aragorn leads his army against Sauron's orcs.

The Hobbit Bilbo joins dwarves looking to retake their kingdom after 
it is conquered by the fearsome dragon Smaug.

movieName: The Hobbit The Desolation of Smaug
description:
After many exciting adventures, Bilbo and the dwarves 
finally reach Mount Erebor where the dragon Smaug awaits them.

movieName: The Hobbit The Battle of the Five Armies
description:
After retaking their kingdom from the dragon Smaug, Bilbo, Thorin, 
and the company of dwarves unwittingly unleash a deadly force on the world. 
Obsessed with his gold treasure, Thorin sacrifices his friendship 
and honor and forces Bilbo to make an almost impossible decision.

For the very first time in the history of the Spider-Man movies, 
our friendly superhero has been exposed and can no longer keep his normal life 
separate from his dangerous life as a superhero. When he turns to 
Doctor Strange for help, the stakes are higher than ever before. 
This forces him to face what it really means to be Spider-Man.

Six talented people are selected to fake their deaths. 
They form an elite unit around a mysterious leader and set out 
to improve the future.

The world's best bodyguard takes on a new assignment: protecting a hit man. 
They must team up to get to The Hague within 24 hours 
to take down a murderous dictator.

Wade Wilson is tortured and given superpowers by a mad scientist. 
Armed with his powers - and sense of humor - he decides to take revenge.
